channel.title: replace on INFINI Pizza
channel.description: Recent content in replace on INFINI Pizza

item.title: Replace a document
item.description: Replace a document # Replace an existing document by specifying its unique identifier and the new content. Examples # Replace a document news_001 of the collection my-collection with new content: PUT /my-collection/_doc/news_001 { "message": "GET /search HTTP/1.1 200 1070000", "org": { "id": "infinilabs" } } The API returns as following result: {"_id":"0,0", "_key":"news_001", "result":"updated"} After the document modification, If you perform the fetch request: GET /my-collection/_doc/news_001 It returns an updated document like:
